title: Rinsed, blow-dried and ready
author: VD
content_html:
Ladies and gentleman, I give you the Rottweiler of Republicanism, the hero of hairstyling, the man who makes Sean Hannity look like a balding liberal Democrat, Mr. Craigp!

Yes, that’s right, he even has a blog now.

I’m sad to report that he has compromised on some of his principles, however, as he has endorsed a candidate for President who can only be described as follicularly challenged.
content_text:
Ladies and gentleman, I give you the Rottweiler of Republicanism, the hero of hairstyling, the man who makes Sean Hannity look like a balding liberal Democrat, Mr. Craigp!
Yes, that’s right,
he even has a blog now
.
I’m sad to report that he has compromised on some of his principles, however, as he has endorsed a candidate for President who can only be described as follicularly challenged.
